name: Destructure
description: In this puzzle game, the goal is to get the wood ball into the metal basket. Sounds easy enough right? Well, you cant move the ball nor the basket. The levels are made up of blocks that you can click to break. You can break these blocks to manipulate the environment, causing the ball to roll into the basket. As the game progresses, the puzzles get harder, and you will encounter different types of blocks with special properties.
